channel.title: (Help) someone help me code so that something only happens once... read more
channel.description: so i want when you log in for the first time you get the char design screen up, i managed to do that but it still comes up after your first time logging in, please help. thx

item.title: (Help) someone help me code so that something only happens once... read more
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

i would think that you would do somthing like what HelpmePl0x said except instead of putting “else if(character-gamecount >= 1)” you would put somthing more like

else if(case 101) == true);
{
closeInterface();
}

put this underneath the code for making it appear when you log on and it should work. If it doesnt work, change the “case 101” part to whichever the variable is to change the character’s appearance.

Read full topic
